content.rendered:
Arianit Pajaziti
CEO

Arianit Pajaziti

Appbites – part of Sigma Technology Group

Session: ICT and Digital: The Evolution of SaaS and Emerging Technologies

Arianit Pajaziti is a passionate entrepreneur, and software engineer with more than 12 years of experience in Information Technology and software development. He co-founded Appbites in 2016 and served as its CEO, guiding the company to specialize in delivering custom mobile and web solutions worldwide. Under Arianit’s leadership, Appbites successfully executed projects for clients in the UK, USA, Sweden, and throughout Europe, providing innovative software solutions tailored to business needs.

In 2024 Appbites merged with Sigma Technology Group under Arianit’s direction, and he continues to provide software services within the Sigma Group.

Arianit holds an MSc in Computer Science from the University of Antwerp, where he graduated with Distinction, and a Professional Certificate in Information Technology from the Illinois Institute of Technology in Chicago.

Company Profile

Founded in 2016, Appbites Shpk is a leading software development company that specializes in web and mobile application development, cloud architecture, IT, blockchain consulting, and quality assurance services. With a team of experienced developers and technology experts, we work closely with our clients to create innovative, customized solutions that are tailored to their specific needs and designed to drive growth and success.
We have worked with clients globally, including the UK, Germany, USA, Sweden, Switzerland. Our web and mobile application development services cover a wide range of industries, from e-commerce to healthcare and finance. Our team has expertise in a variety of programming languages and development frameworks. We are committed to creating user-friendly, scalable, and secure applications that meet our clients’ requirements and exceed their expectations.
